title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Wednesday 21 February - BBC News
summary: tributes to teen stab death victim .
five arrests in modern slavery raids .
artist in greeting card row with park .

text: derby county 2-2 leeds united

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: dedicated live coverage has ended for today but some breaking news , sport and travel will continue to appear through the night .
we will be back again tomorrow at 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : cold and dry night with patches of mist
text: any lingering showers will die away this evening to leave a cold , dry and partly cloudy night .
here 's your full forecast .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: major road closure set to continue
text: it looks like the closure on welford road , in leicester , might still be in place tomorrow morning - this has the potential to cause some major traffic issues .
if you usually use this route you might want to think of a `` plan b '' .
# leicester .
advance warning .
citybound side of welford rd closed at junction with putney rd and victoria pk rd due to emergency water mains work .
junction expected to remain closed tomorrow , consider an alternative route if poss .
any idea if @ twitterid have been notified/planned routes for those of us who use buses ?
@ twitterid hi susie , which services do you use ?
we will check with the operating depot .
^mp
49 , down to lri .
i have options , but i 'd like to plan my morning .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: power cut in ilkeston
text: dinner might have to wait a bit longer if you live in ilkeston .
we are aware of a # powercut at # ilkeston # de7 and the surrounding areas .
we apologise and estimate 19:00 to restore the power .
kay
was wathing olym
hi apologies , engineers will restore the power as quick as possible.kay

jay

want me dinner
i am sorry .
we will be as quick as possible for you there .
jay
back on , way faster than expected thank you : )
you 're welcome and sorry for the problem there .

author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: emergency services at town centre `` incident ''
text: here 's another photo from the scene in ashbourne .
there 's still no more information about what the `` ongoing police incident '' is but the police , fire and ambulance services are all in attendance .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: water company hopes to fix 'odour issue '
text: severn trent is inviting people in ashbourne to find out how it plans to deal with a local odour issue .
the water company said there have been `` issues '' with smells in the area and that it wants to do `` everything it can '' to deal with the problem .
we 've been working with the local people for a while now and recently we 've been carrying out some surveys .
we now want to talk about our plans .
severn trent is holding a drop-in session on 28 february between 18:30 and 19:30 .
it 's at the elim pentecostal church on waterside road in the town .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: man 's death 'was stabbing '
text: a post-mortem examination has revealed a man who was found fatally injured at a house on strathmore close , hucknall , on sunday , died of a stab wound to the abdomen .
a 20-year-old woman has been charged with the murder of christopher pearson , 39 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: 'disturbance ' leads to road closure
text: a section of road near ashbourne market place has been closed due to an `` ongoing police incident '' .
derbyshire police has said it relates to a call they received at about 14:15 reporting a disturbance at an address in the market place .
more on this as we get it .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: man charged with robbery of girl , 12
text: man charged with robbery of girl , 12

documents.title: men jailed over kidnap
text: three men have been jailed in connection with the kidnap and false imprisonment of a man in leicester .
omar splatt , from lime avenue in groby , was found guilty of kidnap , false imprisonment and causing grievous bodily harm with intent .
the 34-year-old was sentenced to 14 years in prison .
dwight splatt , aged 32 and from the same address , was found guilty of the same offences and jailed for 13 years .
ahmed omar , of martindale close in leicester , was found guilty of false imprisonment .
the 31-year-old has been sentenced to five years in prison .
police have said that in september last year , while the victim had been dropping a friend off at an address in the city , a man approached his car .
he was pulled out from the driver seat and put in the back while a second man got inside and started driving .
a third man joined them and demanded £ 20,000 from the victim , who was later taken into a park area where he was kicked and beaten before being put into the boot of his car .
lalji visavadia , from the force , praised the victim 's bravery .
this was a prolonged and horrific ordeal , '' he said .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: leicester pay £ 3.1m to settle efl dispute
text: leicester pay £ 3.1m to settle efl dispute

documents.title: former school groundsman jailed for abuse
text: former school groundsman jailed for abuse

documents.title: artist in row over charge to paint tower
text: artist in row over charge to paint tower

documents.title: robbers held knife to elderly man 's throat
text: an elderly man was dragged out of bed and threatened at knifepoint during a burglary in wollaton .
it happened in a flat above the post office in bramcote lane in the early hours of this morning .
two men went inside the flat and demanded money from the 83-year-old while holding a knife to his throat .
they took the man 's watch and some cash before leaving the property .
the victim and his family were thankfully unhurt but have been left very shaken by this distressing incident . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: 'leicester set standard for forwards '
text: 'leicester set standard for forwards '

documents.title: rams midfielder could make injury return
text: derby county midfielder george thorne is in contention for tonight 's match against leeds after missing the defeat at sheffield wednesday .
rams boss gary rowett has no new injury or suspension concerns .
victory could lift his side back into the championship 's automatic promotion places .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: police hunting teens who 'taunted 67-year-old '
text: an old man was `` cruelly taunted '' by a group of teenagers on friday night .
derbyshire police said three boys took the 68-year-old 's walking stick and verbally abused him in the sussex circus area of chaddesden on friday night .
parents are being urged to question their teenagers in case they know something about what happened .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: man charged over robbery of 12-year-old
text: a 22-year-old man has been charged with the robbery of a 12-year-old girl , following the release of cctv footage which showed her struggling with an attacker .
a man targeted the girl in cambridge avenue in derby on sunday afternoon , eventually making off with her phone .
patrik gunar , 22 , from derby , is in police custody and will appear at southern derbyshire magistrates ' court tomorrow .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: former cattle market to become car dealership
text: a national motor dealership has submitted plans to build a huge multi-million pound jaguar land rover dealership on part of the former derby cattle market .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: nottingham lace industry gets royal seal of approval
text: the queen praised the nottingham lace industry during a visit to london fashion week .
the remarks were made in a speech before she presented the inaugural queen elizabeth ii award for british design .
she said : `` from the tweed of the hebrides to nottingham lace , and of course carnaby street , our fashion industry has been renowned for outstanding craftsmanship for many years .
`` [ it ] continues to produce world-class textiles and cutting edge , practical designs . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: ex-forest managers attend england rugby training
text: two former nottingham forest managers , stuart pearce and mark warburton , were guests at the england rugby team 's training on tuesday .
the pair attended pennyhill park as eddie jones prepared his side for saturday 's calcutta cup match with scotland .
jones has regularly invited coaches from other sports to attend training sessions .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: traffic diverted for water pipe repairs
text: drivers heading into leicester on welford road are being diverted so a burst water pipe can be fixed .
the road is closed around putney road - this map shows the new route in place along victoria park road , london road and tigers way .
there 's no estimated time yet for when the works will be complete .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: death of girl , 6 , prompts police probe
text: death of girl , 6 , prompts police probe

documents.title: 'abnormal load ' expected to cause delays
text: derbyshire police are escorting an `` abnormal load '' from calver to shirebrook this afternoon .
the wide steel frame is being transported along the a619 and a617 through chesterfield , over j29 of the m1 to pleasley roundabout and through shirebrook .
drivers in the area are being warned to expect `` slight delays '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: breakingschool groundsman jailed for 17 years for abuse
text: a boarding school groundsman has been jailed for 17 years for `` ruining the lives of two vulnerable boys '' who he abused more than 25 years ago .
peter weyman worked as a handyman at chelfham mill school , near barnstaple , where he preyed on a 12-year-old pupil and groomed him with cigarettes , alcohol and gifts , exeter crown court heard .
weyman had come to devon after moving from south yorkshire , where he had also abused a boy over more than two years .
weyman , 67 , of cleveland close , carlton in lindrick , nottinghamshire , admitted seven offences of indecency against the first victim and four against the second .
he was also put on the sex offenders ' register for life and made subject of a sexual harm prevention order which restricts any future contact with children .

documents.title: your comments : artist charged to paint old john
text: lots of you on facebook have been talking about bradgate park trust charging a local artist to sell her images of old john .
felicity zeb said : `` this made me cross .
charles bennion gave this property to the people of leicester .
for the trust to assume the right to make them pay like this pushes its role too far .
it goes against the spirit of his gift . ''
christian smith said : `` disgusting .
who do bradgate park trust think they are ?
perhaps they would like to tell us all how much money they make each year from car park charges . ''

phillip cann said : `` it costs a considerable amount to keep it looking as it does and as there are no magic money trees in the park the trust has to raise money in a variety of ways , the fact that the artist has decided to turn her painting into a commercial enterprise would suggest that she is also profiting from the painting so i do n't think £ 100 is unreasonable . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: charity 'putting a price ' on landmark building
text: the artist behind these paintings of old john in bradgate park has told the bbc it 's `` sad '' that the park trust is `` putting a price '' on the landmark .
sarah king has been told she will have to pay £ 100 to the bradgate park trust if she wants to continue selling her images of old john as a way of making money .
she told the bbc : `` there are ways of putting money into the park - we all pay for parking - we love to go there with the kids .
i just find it very strange that they want to put a price on it really . ''
this is not the bradgate park trust clamping down on peoples use of a much loved image .
it 's nothing to do with free public use , public sharing , people creating artworks .
it 's where people are seeking to monetise that image for private profit .
we are a charity .
any money we make from this goes straight back into running the park . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: village in shock after six-year-old 's death
text: one woman , who lives nearby , told me she has seen a mother and older girl living at the house but had never seen a six-year-old girl or a father living there .
the neighbour 's husband was at home when the girl was found .
he saw a child being carried out on a stretcher and taken away in an ambulance .
he also saw a woman , who he assumed to be the mother , taken away in a police car .
the neighbour told me : `` the first thing we knew was the police turning up and the helicopter presence , and there were lots of ambulances .
`` the police photographers were photographing late into the evening because we could see the flashes going off .
`` i believe the older girl goes to tuxford academy but i did n't know the six-year-old existed . ''
she only found out the girl had died when she read a news story .
`` my husband texted me and said 'this is what happened ' and we were shocked .
`` it seems a bit scary .
my husband said the lady came out saying 'is she going to be ok ? '
and she was taken away in a police car after the stretcher was taken away . ''
author: Caroline Lowbridge
BBC News in Tuxford

documents.title: death of six-year-old girl : at the scene
text: i 'm in lincoln road in tuxford where a six-year-old girl was found unresponsive on monday afternoon and later died .
the house is on the corner of landa grove .
the front garden is taped off and there 's a police car parked outside with a pcso inside , who told me that the house is currently empty .
there are two bunches of flowers outside and in the garden i can see a pink and purple wendy house .
author: Caroline Lowbridge
BBC News in Tuxford

documents.title: trains running again after bridge crash
text: east midlands trains tweets
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: tributes after death of six-year-old girl
text: floral tributes have been left for a six-year-old girl who died after being found unresponsive in a nottinghamshire village .
police said she was found on monday afternoon on lincoln road in tuxford .
she was taken to sheffield children 's hospital , but was pronounced dead shortly after .
a police cordon remains in place in the village and inquiries into the death are `` ongoing '' .
author: Caroline Lowbridge
BBC News in Tuxford

documents.title: major road closed for water repairs
text: if you 're out in leicester this afternoon this might cause you some delays .
the citybound closure of welford road in # leicester is now starting to be set up , diversions in use around the putney road , victoria park road junction for emergency water mains repairs .
duration tbc
do you have a map of the diversion ?
would be really useful for the morning commute
hi lara , scroll back on our timeline , we retweeted one a short time ago
thanks : )
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: community clubs together to replace pony trap
text: it 's not very often you see a pony and trap these days - well unless you live in the vale of belvoir .
alex north and her children are often seen out with her shetland pony but recently the carriage was stolen .
after hearing about the robbery the local community decided they wanted to `` turn something rubbish into something positive '' and help alex replace the stolen carriage .
an appeal was set up by neighbours trevor and rebecca , who managed to raise £ 250 .
rebecca helped set up the fundraiser and told the bbc : `` there 's a community spirit here like nowhere i 've ever lived before . ''
here 's a message from trevor , rebecca , alex and her children .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: rail delays after vehicle hits bridge
text: east midlands trains tweets
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: concern over choice of peer for charity role
text: mps have refused to sign off the appointment of a conservative peer chosen by the government to become the new charity commission boss .
tina stowell does not have the experience , neutrality or capability to take on the top job at the watchdog , according to the digital culture media and sport committee .
baroness stowell of beeston failed to show any real insight about the charity sector and was unable to withstand scrutiny , it said .
culture secretary matt hancock said the peer had his full backing and would be a `` brilliant '' chair of the charity commission .
author: Press Association

documents.title: scarf plea to boost pride park atmosphere
text: a newly formed derby county supporters ' group is calling on all fans to bring scarves to the match with leeds tonight to create a special atmosphere .
the rams are still chasing automatic promotion to the premier league , but suffered a shock loss to sheffield wednesday last week .
luke boden , from the south stand 12th ram , said : `` we 've only just set up so we ca n't really put on any big displays with black and white cards or flags .
`` the first thing we can do , everyone has got a scarf , so they can bring that and we can see if that works . ''
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: 'one-in , one-out ' policy at busy zoo
text: twycross zoo tweets
11am update - it 's another busy day at the zoo .
please be advised that we are operating on a one-in one-out entry and will be admitting cars as guests leave .
if you are planning on visiting us today , please check your travel alerts ahead of your journey .
team tz
oh goodie ! !
queue on the # a444 from the m42 again !
that seems like a good idea # twycrosszoo really !
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: mps to debate ambulance service performance
text: the performance of east midlands ambulance service ( emas ) will be discussed by mps later
the hour-long westminster hall debate has been secured by high peak mp ruth george .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: men flee a38 crash scene
text: police would like to hear from anyone that saw this crash on the a38 near somercotes last week .
two of the people involved ran from away from the scene .
it happened at about 16:00 on saturday 17 february near the junction for cotes park .
police have said the driver of a seat ibiza careered into the central reservation of the southbound carriageway after hitting the back of a ford focus .
the two people in the seat , described as asian men , ran away .
an elderly man and woman in the ford were left with minor injuries .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: on this day : 1998
text: a blast from the past
emile heskey scored twice as # lcfc beat chelsea 2-0 # onthisday 20 years ago !
martin o'neill up his first win as # lcfc manager # onthisday two years earlier in 1996 .
what a shame not happy birthday to wish to your best player ! ! !
happy birthday @ twitterid beaucoup de sante et un meilleur avenir que dans ce club de `` dechra ''
the greatest heskey
trying to take away from their good result yesterday ?
i see
20 years jeez
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: work underway to open robin hood restaurant
text: a nottinghamshire legend is the inspiration behind the next big thing on the london dining scene .
michelin-starred tom sellars is opening a pop-up restaurant based around robin hood and sherwood forest .
the nottingham-born chef 's venture , called merry men , will be open for two-and-a-half weeks in april while his main restaurant is being refurbished .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: house fire in north kilworth
text: firefighters are tackling a blaze at a property in north kilworth .
the building in question is a converted residential barn on green lane .
the fire is on the first floor of the property .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: artist in bradgate park greeting card row
text: an artist has been told to pay for the privilege of using an iconic leicestershire landmark in her paintings if she wants to keep making money from it .
sarah king originally painted old john at bradgate park for an exhibition .
she decided to turn the image into greetings cards to sell .
but she has been told she will have to pay £ 100 to continue using it in her work .
bradgate park trust said it registered the landmark as a trademark in 2001 , to protect its image from being exploited for private commercial gain .
it added that there is no restriction on sharing and publishing images of old john for non-commercial purposes .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: five arrested in modern slavery raids
text: five people have been arrested during simultaneous raids in derby and latvia as part of an investigation into modern slavery and human trafficking .
two men and two women were arrested at two houses in latvia on tuesday , while a 32-year-old woman was arrested at a house in st james ' road , normanton .
a man in his 60s was found living in a shack in the back garden of one of the houses raided in latvia .
six people have already been charged as part of the large-scale operation .
author: Neil Heath
BBC News

documents.title: efl roundup : forest draw , magpies lose
text: lee tomlin rescued a point for nottingham forest against reading last night , ending the club 's near 500-minute goal drought .
the on-loan cardiff forward 's 85th minute strike cancelled out omar richards ' opener .
the result means aitor karanka 's side have won just once in their past 12 league games .
tonight , derby could move back into the championship 's automatic promotion places with a win against leeds .
in league two , notts county slipped to a 1-0 defeat at cambridge .
the result means that kevin nolan 's promotion-chasing magpies remain in the play-off places , four points off third place .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: m1 reopens following crash
text: highways england tweets
# leicestershire .
all lanes on # m1 northbound between j19 and j20 now open following an earlier incident .
@ twitterid
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: tributes to teen stab death victim
text: tributes have been left to a 17-year-old boy , who died a week after being stabbed following a chase .
lyrico steede was attacked by a group in stock well , bulwell , nottingham , at about 19:30 gmt on 13 february .
he was taken to hospital and has since died .
police said his family is `` devastated by this senseless murder '' .
officers have launched a murder investigation and are appealing for anyone with information or any witnesses to contact them .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: 'you feel like you need to protect elise '
text: 'you feel like you need to protect elise '
author: Alistair Magowan
BBC Sport

documents.title: police probe into six-year-old 's death
text: a six-year-old girl has died after being found unresponsive in a nottinghamshire village .
police said she was found at around 15:00 on monday afternoon on lincoln road ( in tuxford .
she was taken to sheffield children 's hospital , but was pronounced dead shortly after .
inquiries into the death `` are still ongoing , '' nottinghamshire police added .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: travel : latest from region 's roads
text: here 's how it is looking on the region 's roads :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to wednesday across derbyshire , leicestershire , nottinghamshire and rutland .
amy woodfield and i will be here until later with the best of the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News
